other_tests.findings: Right atrial enlargement, right ventricular hypertrophy with a strain pattern, and possible biventricular hypertrophy.
Patches of mild T2 hyperintensity in the white matter of the centrum semiovale indicating increased water content; no signs of restricted diffusion suggest ischemia.
Lobular disarray with prominent bands of fibrosis, bands of fibrosis with early regenerative nodules suggestive of early cirrhosis, and diffuse hepatocellular damage with giant-cell transformation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The biopsy findings indicate progression to early cirrhosis.
